This is the main repository of the CakePHP Sugar templating language project

- ALWAYS RUN AND FIX PHPCS, PHPSTAN, RECTOR ISSUES
- ALWAYS ADD OR UPDATE UNIT TESTS AFTER CHANGES
- ADHERE TO CAKEPHP 5.2+ CODING STANDARDS
- ADHERE TO CAKEPHP 5.2+ FUNCTIONALITY
- USE PHP 8.2+ FUNCTIONALITY WHERE POSSIBLE
- KEEP CODE DRY!
- ALWAYS USE PHP CONSTRUCTOR PROPERTY PROMOTION WHERE POSSIBLE.
- ALWAYS RELY ON PHPSTAN, PHPCS CONFIGS, DO NOT PASS EXTRA ARGUMENTS THAT OVERRIDE THESE CONFIGS
- NEVER USE GITHUB MCP TOOLS TO WRITE FILES AND OTHER WRITE OPERATIONS !
- MAKE SURE WE DON'T LOOSE CODE COVERAGE UNLESS
